name: Wheels of Progress
description:
Made for the Mini jam 63 in 72 hours.

Theme: Future
Limitation: this color palet

I am too lazy/tired to write some thematic fluff, so bear with me. I will change it tomorrow.

Controls:

  • WASD for driving
  • Mouse for aiming
  • left mouse button to select or shoot
  • space for braking
  • tab to flip car
  • g to release cyber solders
  • m to open map
  • o to open options
  • esc to exit
  • enter to reload level

Mouse might be inverted idk, there is some UI weirdness that I can't be bothered to fix and the car has probably one of the worst curve handling. Hopefully the crash bug died, didn't have time to check, but you can avoid it if you're moving at a moderate pace.

No browser build, It might die due to the terribly optimized bullets, maybe I'll do one later.

If you have any issues please write a comment!
